added_paradox.name: Appreciation Inflation
added_paradox.summary: Publicly celebrate the workforce while privately shrinking their survival margins.
added_paradox.example_quote: We appreciate you! Hereâ€™s your hat and a 2-cent raise. Also, insurance now costs your soul plus $70,000.
added_paradox.detected_pattern: Symbolic gratitude masking material neglect; morale theater replacing compensation.

humor_recalibration_prompts: Ask if the compliment can be used to pay rent.
Measure sincerity by net caloric transfer, not press releases.
Frame the memo as stand-up material; note which parts make people cry before they laugh.
